PoolTogetherDeposited(address,address,ui.notice: This event is emitted every time Pool Together depositTo is invoked successfully.

poolTogetherDepositTicket(uint256,addres.notice: This function deposits the users funds into a Pool Together Prize Pool for a ticket.

poolTogetherWithdrawAll(uint256,address).notice: This function withdraws the users funds from a Pool Together Prize Pool.
